title: Academic Minors  · Angelo State University
description: Explore Angelo State University’s diverse range of undergraduate minors to enhance your degree and career prospects.

paragraphs: Many of ouracademic programsrequire a minor. We offer a variety of minors to choose from. Full information regarding each minor can be found in theUniversity Catalog.
